department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one of twelve paintings of flower arrangements in an oblong folio book bound in silk; flowers resemble petunias, lilies, peony and chrysanthemum in blue, orange, red and white respectively; vase has a woven basket-like appearance, trapezoid shape with gold handle; flowers on side of vase; blue and red tassel attached to bottom of vase
title: Untitled [flower arrangement]
